Posts.Content: Fighterm, so sorry to hear of your struggles with lymphoma & your hair loss on top of that. Glad you are breathing better & hope the tumor is gone. Keep us posted on your CT scan results and bladder checkup results. Sending you good thoughts, well wishes and prayers for good news.
Posts.Title: Drug resistance in oncology

Posts.Content: Thank you, as always, for sharing the scientific facts behind cancer treatments. Hope you are doing well and the worst is over for you. Continued good health. Your posts are always very insightful and very much appreciated.
Posts.Title: Drug resistance in oncology
